content:
as the city of Goleta prepares for life as an incorporated area of the county all eyes are on the citys first mayor Margaret Connell PERIOD

On Nov PERIOD  Connell and four other Goleta residents  Jean Blois Cynthia Brock Jack Hawxhurst and Jonny Wallis  were elected to the newly formed Goleta City Council PERIOD For the past three years the group has worked to successfully pass the city of Goleta on the ballot PERIOD

I didnt know if this was something I really wanted to do because it does really tie down your life Connell said PERIOD I am feeling pretty good PERIOD I am beginning to take care of business and beginning to realize how much there is we have to take care of  I am going to have to find someone to help me with all these small little details PERIOD I dont think I ever imagined being the first mayor but here I am. connell became interested in the issue of Goleta cityhood around  when citizens brought forth a proposal for the city of Goleta Beach a plan that included Isla Vista PERIOD The proposal never made it to the ballots PERIOD

Three years ago Connell joined Goleta Now a advocate group for Goleta cityhood PERIOD After the Santa Barbara County Board of Supervisors approved Goleta Nows proposed city boundaries for the November  election Connell decided to run for mayor PERIOD

Margaret has been just great in her support of cityhood and the ways she has used her skills and resources to move cityhood along PERIOD It has been really hard at times but she really hung in there Brock said PERIOD

Raised in Devon England Connell graduated with a degree in zoology from Oxford University PERIOD She met her husband UCSB professor emeritus Joe Connell in Scotland while he was conducting research PERIOD The Connells moved to Goleta from Scotland in  and Margaret Connell was appointed to a teaching position in UCSBs biology department PERIOD The couple raised their four children in Goleta and have nine grandchildren PERIOD

She is a very communityminded individual who has been deeply involved in all aspects of the community and the region for over  years going on  PERIOD She is a really nice and experienced person we are lucky to have her leading us in this kickoff Hawxhurst said PERIOD

Connell began her political involvement in  with her election to the Santa Barbara School Board PERIOD She served four terms with the school board until  PERIOD During that time she also founded the Santa Barbara Womens Political Commission alongside Santa Barbara mayorelect Marty Blum and Congresswoman Lois Capps DSanta Barbara PERIOD

The goal was to elect women who were advocates for women and to be supportive of feminist issues and issues of concern to women Connell said PERIOD

In  Connell was also one of the first people to serve on the board for the local Planned Parenthood PERIOD She then joined the staff as the Public Affairs Director where she helped advocate reproductive issues until her retirement in  PERIOD

Margaret is not a stranger to any of this kind of stuff Brock said PERIOD It is kind of reassuring to have someone carrying out meetings and leading us in our first year who has had this great deal of relevant experience. print

Comments are closed PERIOD

Forgetting to take off the ratty AF1s at the potluck most Asian households dont take kindly to shoes in the house

Wearing your only red tshirt to every final Red is a lucky color in many cultures especially Chinese cultures

Putting spiders in your friends wedding dress for good luck Has its origins in old english folklore and represents abundance for the couple

Accidentally summoned a ghost by leaving their chopsticks straight up A superstition that has Chinese origins because the chopsticks are reminiscent of funeral incense

Didnt like your friends significant other so they gifted them an umbrella The word for umbrella san sounds like the word for divorce in Chinese

Believing in horoscopes The modern western zodiac actually came from Babylonian astrology

Walked backwards in Portugal to live out the Faust fantasy In Portugal walking backwards allows the devil to know exactly where you are

Stole a raven from the tower of london as reparations According to UK superstition if there arent  ravens in the tower the kingdom will fall

Breaks a knuckle knocking on wood for good scores on finals Knocking on wood may have originated from the Celts and their love for tree spirits

Drunkenly rearranging their apartment for the feng shui at  AM A Chinese cultural practice that harmonizes a person with the energies of the environment around them

Left out their middle name on their taxes because the Fae run the IRS Giving the Fae your full name gives them power over you and the IRS has too much

Hit by a car but the license plate had an angel number Beyond just blowing up on TikTok angel numbers were invented by.. PERIOD Pythagoras
title: Margaret Connell Prepares for Future as Mayor of Goleta | The Daily Nexus
name: University of California Santa Barbara
